Title: Help Me
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Raphael Jackson Jr., Damione Macedon, Vladimir Cvetko (executive story editor), Safia Dirie (story editor), Jeff Dix (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: The AUSA forces Viberos to collaborate but an unexpected ally appears to avoid his predicament. Ghost is facing an awkward moment but suddenly he is out of the clear. Tommy does something unexpected and he joins forces again with Ghost.
